comment.author: 92987904@N00
comment._content: Dolorita O'Gorman was one of seven daughters of James Aloysius O'Gorman (May 5, 1860–May 17, 1943), Justice of the New York District Court from 1893 to 1899, Justice of the New York State Supreme Court from 1900 to 1911, and United States Senator from 1911 to 1917. Dolorita O'Gorman married John Anthony Maher in May, 1913. Miss O'Gorman Weds J. A. Maher -- New York Times

comment.author: 32159027@N02
comment._content: She not to happy i wish her buona furtuna.Nick D.P.
